Text: FW End of quarter origination numbers Revised Origination Schedule Cc Attached is the revised September YTD Origination Schedule which includes MPR Activity I will be sending each team their schedule supporting detail I will be asking that all revisions be submitted by Wednesday October Let me know if you have any questions Original Message From Killen Faith Sent Wednesday October PM To Carter Carol Subject FW End of quarter origination numbers lets discuss Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Wednesday October PM To Killen Faith Subject RE End of quarter origination numbers I think we need to include groups with MPR where is was originated this year Original Message From Killen Faith Sent Wednesday October PM To Kitchen Louise Subject RE End of quarter origination numbers Generations Investments YTD balance is all MPR activity so we didnt pick up bc were showing only originations should we add I dont see any originations tagged to him specifically Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Monday October PM To Killen Faith Subject FW End of quarter origination numbers I think we are missing Generation investments and Mitch Robinsons group Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Friday October PM To Calger Christopher F Milnthorp Rob Tycholiz Barry Lagrasta Fred Curry Mike Jacoby Ben Luce Laura Vickers Frank W Llodra John Kroll Heather Redmond Brian Forster David Williams Jaime Miller Don Asset Mktg Josey Scott Mrha Jean Baughman Edward D Cc Killen Faith Subject End of quarter origination numbers Q now over you will each be receiving in the internal mail a copy of the origination numbers associated with each of your groups Please could you ensure the numbers are both i Correct and ii Correctly allocated Should employees have left the group or company please do not allocate the amount to another originator as this will distort the numbers just leave the name of the employee and number in place although they have left These numbers will be used as a obviously only one component component of performance review As you know we also monitor the soft targets so please ensure these are correct too If you want to check your progress on soft targets these are available from Faith Please send all alterations to Faith Killen or call her on Thanks Louise

FW Soft Targets West GasBarry attached are the soft targets and the origination detail for West Gas Please let me know if you have any questions or revisions Original Message From Killen Faith Sent Monday October AM To Carter Carol Subject FW Soft Targets West Gas Hi Carol Can you send this to Barry Original Message From Tycholiz Barry Sent Monday October AM To Killen Faith Subject Soft Targets West Gas Faith pls advise as to soft targets budget vs actuals year to date for West Gas Origination BT

West Gas Q YTD OriginationBarry Attached is a revised origination schedule for rd quarter and supporting detail Please provide any revisions by Wednesday October I will consolidate the originations for all teams and submit to Louise Let me know if you have any questions Have a Great Day Carol L Carter
